fields.description: Currently, internal services like Empyrean, do not support STS tokens or session tokens (from GUI). The services are accessible to authenticated users currently with persistent credentials (accesskey, secretkey), so they should also support STS as well.
fields.summary: Empyrean service should be accessible to users authenticating with STS tokens

comments.body: [~rusvika] and [~sjones], as per arch-meeting discussion I'm adding support for GUI as well as STS tokens for the internal pipelines, which includes Empyrean. Normal authz still applies so this is just a change in the auth/tokens allowed to establish identity.

Tested using boto to get STS credentials and then use those creds with 'empyrean-describe-services -I <accesskey> -S <secretkey> --security-token <tokenid>'

Boto code was:
{code}
import boto.sts
from boto.sts import STSConnection
from boto.regioninfo import RegionInfo
import os
TOKEN_ENDPOINT='<fill in IP of CLC>'

if __name__ == '__main__':
	conn = STSConnection(aws_access_key_id=os.environ['AWS_ACCESS_KEY'], aws_secret_access_key=os.environ['AWS_SECRET_KEY'], is_secure=False, port=8773, debug=1, region=RegionInfo(name="euca", endpoint=TOKEN_ENDPOINT, connection=STSConnection), path='/services/Tokens', validate_certs=False, anon=False)	
	token = conn.get_session_token(duration="900")
	print "-I " + token.access_key + " -S " + token.secret_key + " --security-token " + token.session_token
{code}

Output from script looks like:
{code}
[root@b-39]# python get_token.py 
-I AKIAAL4DYP6I2LLYR4C6 -S 5jcZNQsHfiV7cIypIbatEReTwfLS077Oxsd41Aw6 --security-token ZXVjYQAB0mwejg2jNHyMQrNLkLcAa0XarpJDidybP9vmig8mI/WvsDj4dYExxel/NvKq8dsXFloevoaXdX6r8xrsp61/luvHYxB0WxDjootc+EdU/1DP6r9V1kotCnDkkQhnNnbWDUkOxlLlvyqEvwF6E7mPHfP/XYsUs/snX4PvAh+PF9HUnBGk4Wc9TRVtvozncSJpspqith7PFk4A04wqYyVRq3Aq0AfMLlcFaBCDQBGGNAkE4GuwEdw=
{code}

You can run the following and get the expected output below:
{code}
[root@b-39 ~]# python get_token.py | xargs empyrean-describe-services -U http://10.111.5.92:8773/services/Empyrean
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.autoscaling     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap        10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  cloudformation        API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.cloudformation  enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  cloudwatch            API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.cloudwatch      enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend     eucalyptus       10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  cluster               one              one-cc-1                        enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  compute               API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.compute         enabled  /(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read:000884060382:265a4d1f57564619531054561d3d1b201fc5c3e3b5652e3953027103b1528543  
SERVICE  dns                   API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.dns             enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  euare                 API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.euare           enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  eucalyptus            eucalyptus       10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  identity              API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.identity        enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  imaging               API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.imaging         enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus       10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  jetty                 eucalyptus       10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.loadbalancing   enabled  /(eucalyptus)loadbalancing:000916078437:3a4d1018223654482125571c3d1a28483044279656e5022a4555f50564b32147  
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus       10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  notifications         eucalyptus       10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  objectstorage         API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.objectstorage   enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  pollednotifications   eucalyptus       10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap        10.111.5.92                     enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.simpleworkflow  enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  storage               one              one-sc-1                        enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86.tokens          enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  user-api              API_10.111.5.86  API_10.111.5.86                 enabled                                                                                                            
SERVICE  walrusbackend         walrus           walrus-1                        enabled                                                                                                            
{code}

Verified.  This worked for me.  I was able to run the script as described above and I got the following:
{code}
[root@g-19-11 ~]# python get_token.py | xargs empyrean-describe-services -U http://10.111.1.135:8773/services/Empyrean
SERVICE  autoscaling           API_10.111.5.169  API_10.111.5.169.autoscaling     enabled  
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend    eucalyptus        10.111.1.135                     enabled  
SERVICE  bootstrap             bootstrap         10.111.1.135                     enabled

SERVICE  identity              API_10.111.5.169  API_10.111.5.169.identity        enabled

SERVICE  imagingbackend        eucalyptus        10.111.1.135                     enabled  
SERVICE  jetty                 eucalyptus        10.111.1.135                     enabled  
SERVICE  loadbalancing         API_10.111.5.169  API_10.111.5.169.loadbalancing   enabled  
SERVICE  loadbalancingbackend  eucalyptus        10.111.1.135                     enabled  
SERVICE  notifications         eucalyptus        10.111.1.135                     enabled

SERVICE  reporting             bootstrap         10.111.1.135                     enabled  
SERVICE  simpleworkflow        API_10.111.5.169  API_10.111.5.169.simpleworkflow  enabled  
SERVICE  storage               one               one-sc-1                         enabled  
SERVICE  tokens                API_10.111.5.169  API_10.111.5.169.tokens          enabled
